title: fabric mixin中如何调用类
author: guaiMiao~
txt_content:
如果直接调用会崩溃：
java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: gui.myScreen is a mixin class and cannot be referenced directly

replies.author: 洞穴夜莺
replies.txt_content: Mixin不能跟其他代码混在一个包里，不然就会出现如上错误
